verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> But, <S%H2005>behold,<s%> they will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H539>believe<s%> me, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto my <S%H6963>voice:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they will <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, What is <S%H4100>that<s%> <S%H2088><s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> A <S%H4294>rod.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7993>Cast<s%> it on the <S%H776>ground.<s%> And he <S%H7993>cast<s%> it on the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H5175>serpent;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> it.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> Put <S%H7971>forth<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H270>take<s%> it by the <S%H2180>tail.<s%> And he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H2388>caught<s%> it, and it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H4294>rod<s%> in his hand: <S%H3709><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> they may <S%H539>believe<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> hath <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5750>furthermore<s%> unto him, <S%H935>Put<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> into thy <S%H2436>bosom.<s%> And he <S%H935>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> into his <S%H2436>bosom:<s%> and when he took it <S%H3318>out,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H6879>leprous<s%> as <S%H7950>snow.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7725>Put<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> thy <S%H2436>bosom<s%> again. And he <S%H7725>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his <S%H2436>bosom<s%> again; and plucked it <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H4480>bosom,<s%> <S%H2436><s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was turned <S%H7725>again<s%> as his other <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> they will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H539>believe<s%> thee, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H226>sign,<s%> that they will <S%H539>believe<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H226>sign.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> they will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H539>believe<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H226>signs,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto thy <S%H6963>voice,<s%> that thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H4480>water<s%> <S%H4325><s%> of the <S%H2975>river,<s%> and <S%H8210>pour<s%> it upon the <S%H3004>dry<s%> land: and the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H3947>takest<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H3006>dry<s%> land.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H994>O<s%> my <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H376>eloquent,<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H4480>heretofore,<s%> <S%H8543><s%> <S%H1571><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8032><s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> <S%H227><s%> thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant:<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am <S%H3515>slow<s%> of <S%H6310>speech,<s%> and of a <S%H3515>slow<s%> <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H4310>Who<s%> hath <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth?<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H7760>maketh<s%> the <S%H483>dumb,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2795>deaf,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H6493>seeing,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H5787>blind?<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%>
Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H1980>go,<s%> and <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H3384>teach<s%> thee <S%H834>what<s%> thou shalt <S%H1696>say.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H994>O<s%> my <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H7971>send,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of him whom thou wilt <S%H7971>send.<s%>

And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> Is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> thy <S%H251>brother?<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> can speak <S%H1696>well.<s%> <S%H1696><s%> And <S%H1571>also,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> cometh <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> thee: and when he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> thee, he will be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> and <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and will <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> ye shall <S%H6213>do.<s%>

And <S%H1931>he<s%> shall be thy <S%H1696>spokesman<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and he shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> even <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> to thee instead of a <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> to him instead of <S%H430>God.<s%>
And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4294>rod<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H226>signs.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> his <S%H2859>father-in-law,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Let me <S%H1980>go,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> my <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> whether they be <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive.<s%> And <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H1980>Go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H1980>Go,<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> are <S%H4191>dead<s%> which <S%H1245>sought<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5315>life.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H7392>set<s%> them <S%H5921>upon<s%> an <S%H2543>ass,<s%> and he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> When thou <S%H1980>goest<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> that thou <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> those <S%H4159>wonders<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7760>put<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand:<s%> but <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H2388>harden<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> that he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853>let<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is my <S%H1121>son,<s%> even my firstborn: <S%H1060><s%>

And I <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, <S%H853>Let<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that he may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me: and if thou <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to let him <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H2026>slay<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1121>son,<s%> even thy <S%H1060>firstborn.<s%>
And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H4411>inn,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6298>met<s%> him, and <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> him.

Then <S%H6855>Zipporah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a sharp <S%H6864>stone,<s%> and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> of her <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H5060>cast<s%> it at his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Surely<s%> a <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H2860>husband<s%> art <S%H859>thou<s%> to me.
So he let him <S%H7503>go:<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H227>then<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> A <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H2860>husband<s%> thou art, because of the <S%H4139>circumcision.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H1980>Go<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> And he <S%H1980>went,<s%> and <S%H6298>met<s%> him in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> him, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H226>signs<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and gathered <S%H622>together<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H226>signs<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H539>believed:<s%> and when they <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6485>visited<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3588>that<s%> he had looked <S%H7200>upon<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H6040>affliction,<s%> then they bowed their <S%H6915>heads<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped.<s%>
